‚ö†Ô∏è **This type is _unstable_ and may change significantly in a way that the data won't be backwards compatible.**
Information about an MCAP channel.

MCAP is a modular container format and logging library for multi-modal robotics data.
This archetype stores channel metadata including topic, encoding, and custom metadata.

See also [MCAP specification](https://mcap.dev/) for more details on the format.

## Fields
### Required
* `id`: [`ChannelId`](../components/channel_id.md)
* `topic`: [`Text`](../components/text.md)
* `message_encoding`: [`Text`](../components/text.md)

### Optional
* `metadata`: [`KeyValuePairs`](../components/key_value_pairs.md)


## Can be shown in
* [DataframeView](../views/dataframe_view.md)
